name: Fusion Racers
description:
Challenge your friends in this Online Multiplayer racing game! Game Info
  • Create and Join Online races with up to 12 players.
  • Race the clock in Time Trial Mode.
  • View global Time Trial Leaderboards.
  • Online functionality powered by Epic Online Services.
  • 9 Playable Circuits in a variety of Unique Environments.
  • 16 Different Characters / Vehicles to choose from.
  • Drive the Electric Hypercars around Challenging Circuits.
Version Info

The current version is 1.8.17. This is the first publicly available version of the game. Future development is likely.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

  • Throttle - W
  • Brake - S
  • Steer - A / D
  • Handbrake - Space
  • Headlights - Q
  • Reset Vehicle - Y
  • Switch View - Tab
  • Pause - Escape

Xbox Controller

  • Throttle - Right Trigger
  • Brake - Left Trigger
  • Steer - Left Joystick
  • Handbrake - B
  • Headlights - A
  • Reset Vehicle - Y
  • Switch View - Back
  • Pause - Start
Installation

Due to the 1GB size limit, this download is split into two parts. You must download and extract both ZIP files, then drag and drop the contents of the part 2 folder into the part 1 folder. After doing so, the game should run correctly.
